description: The tests carried out as part of the early medical check include a Complete Haemogram, Lipid Profile, Liver Function Test, Renal Function Test, Random Blood Sugar, and ECG.

The pre-treatment phase involves consultations with visiting physicians. They diagnose any pre-existing conditions like liver/kidney damage, hypertension, heart disease, or diabetes to create a tailored treatment plan. This process includes medical and nutritional guidance, with regular weekly check-ups by the physician to monitor progress and adjust treatment as needed.

There are instances where the severity of the medical condition requires the patient to undergo specialized treatment. We have a tie-up with Specialist Hospital, a premier multi-specialty hospital in the locality, offering OPD, day-care, and in-patient services.
We follow a strict and disciplined method of storing and dispensing medicines for our patients.

One cannot ignore the mental health of a patient recovering from addiction/alcoholism. Sometimes a dual diagnosis requires a more supportive environment. A psychiatric evaluation and medication help in this process.
